item.title: Backup & Restore Percona XtraDB Cluster | Stash
item.description: This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install Stash Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Backup and Restore Percona XtraDB Cluster using Stash Stash 0.9.0+ supports backup and restoration of Percona XtraDB cluster databases. This guide will show you how you can backup and restore your Percona XtraDB cluster with Stash. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
